definition: Syracuse, New York
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
surname Xue
city walls/city/town/CL:座[zuo4],道[dao4],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Children's Day in New York state is presented every year by this retired elementary school teacher of the Syracuse City School District.
sentences.chinese: 紐約州的兒童節每年由雪城學區的小學退休老師舉辦。

sentences.english: The Islamic Society in Syracuse received threatening telephone messages.
sentences.chinese: 雪城的伊斯蘭教協會還收到過威脅電話留言。

sentences.english: “Before 9/11 we were somewhat timid, ” said Saad Sahraoui, president of the Islamic Society of Central New York, the largest mosque in Syracuse, when the attacks occurred in 2001.
sentences.chinese: 紐約中區伊斯蘭教協會是雪城最大的清真寺。
